title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A beautiful weather dashboard that displays current conditions, forecasts, and weather maps with location-based detection.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This very portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and responsive design.
